inclusion.criterion: Patient with advanced cancer (local recurrence or metastatic) at the time of their follow up visit to the outpatient palliative care clinic
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient designates a family member who is a patient's parent, spouse, adult child, sibling, other relative, or significant other (any other person defined by the patient as a partner) to answer the family questionnaire.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years of age or older (as the assessment tools used in this study have not been validated in the pediatric population).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with normal cognitive status as determined by the interviewer and by her/his ability to understand the nature of the study and consent process.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient willing to participate in the study and sign informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member can not complete the assessments independently.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member refuses to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl. He still experiences difficulty initiating movements, stiffness, and slowness.
